subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Sébastien Bourdais finally conquered Road America, and he took a big step toward a record fourth straight Champ Car title along the way in Elkhart Lake, Wis. Bourdais, who will move to Formula One in 2008, had failed to win on the 4.028-mile, 14-turn natural terrain road course in three previous tries, despite being dominant at times. But in yesterday’s Generac Grand Prix, he started from the pole and overpowered the rest of the 17-car field in picking up his fifth victory of the season.
